title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 06
description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 06 you will learn phrases associated with drinking using idiomatic German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 06 you will learn phrases associated with drinking using idiomatic German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German to talk about drinking.
